name: Secrets of Me
description: "Secrets of Me" is a game where, after getting plastic surgery, you can stalk a hot guy to get him to fall in love with you! If you're tired of typical otome games, then this one's for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Resolution: 1280x720

reviews.review_text: Heroine is so weird and she also has weird personality.i think i love here more than any guys out there. anyway it's good just Akira route right now.god dankit Heroine is so funny.stalk for reverge!? XD this is getting more interesting though 9/10 would be stalker again. well *update* on meguru's route now.He is the worst rich man ever.... on doctor's route now omg i feel so bad to steal her fiance ...i really bad guy here.i am sorry.but i need best and good end...
